title: Tiny Tugboat
description: Tiny Tugboat has a huge job before him when a crowd of boats get stuck in the bay. The plucky tugboat goes to work. Students will enjoy watching him set free boats, ships, and even a submarine! Cartoony illustrations bring humor and personality to the story. Tiny Tugboat uses shorter sentences and dialogue appropriate for emergent readers, and also teaches students about sequencing events and quotation marks.
reviewWords: boats, pulls, ships, stuck, submarine, tugboat
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial consonant /t/ sound
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word out
